name: Reflex Architecture
brief_description: A ReflexSOAR plugin managing Opensearch and Elasticsearch clusters.
description: A ReflexSOAR plugin managing Opensearch and Elasticsearch clusters and their associated indices, including allocation, deletion, and creation.
author: Brian Carroll <brian@hasecuritysolutions.com>

actions.name: manage_index_allocation
actions.description: Manage the index allocation for the cluster.

include_patterns.label: Include Patterns
include_patterns.description: The index patterns, using regular expressions, to include in the allocation.

exclude_patterns.label: Exclude Patterns
exclude_patterns.description: The index patterns, using regular expressions, to exclude from the allocation.

target_tier.label: Target Tier
target_tier.description: The target tier for the indices.

max_age.label: Max Age
max_age.description: The maximum age, in days.  Indices older than this will be allocated to the target tier.

actions.name: collect_index_statistics
actions.description: Collect statistics for the indices in the cluster.

include_patterns.label: Include Patterns
include_patterns.description: The index patterns, using regular expressions, to include in the statistics collection.

exclude_patterns.label: Exclude Patterns
exclude_patterns.description: The index patterns, using regular expressions, to exclude from the statistics collection.

collected_attributes.label: Attributes to Collect
collected_attributes.description: The attributes to collect for the indices.

outputs.label: Outputs
outputs.description: The outputs to send the data to.  If not specified, the data will be sent to the management consoles index stats dataset.

actions.name: manage_index_retention
actions.description: Manage the retention of the indices in the cluster.  By default this action will delete indices by the **latest documents** age.

include_patterns.label: Include Patterns
include_patterns.description: The index patterns, using regular expressions, to include in the statistics collection.

exclude_patterns.label: Exclude Patterns
exclude_patterns.description: The index patterns, using regular expressions, to exclude from the statistics collection.

audit_mode.label: Audit Mode
audit_mode.description: Whether to run in audit mode or not.  When in audit mode, no changes will be made to the indices, but a report will be generated.

max_age.label: Max Age
max_age.description: The maximum age, in days.  Indices where the latest document is older than this will be deleted.  Optionally, toggle the By Index Age switch to delete indices based on their age.

by_index_age.label: By Index Age
by_index_age.description: Toggle to delete indices based on their age instead of the latest documents age.

actions.name: manage_index_rollover
actions.description: Manage the rollover of the indices in the cluster.

include_patterns.label: Include Patterns
include_patterns.description: The index patterns, using regular expressions, to include in the statistics collection.

exclude_patterns.label: Exclude Patterns
exclude_patterns.description: The index patterns, using regular expressions, to exclude from the statistics collection.

max_age.label: Max Age
max_age.description: The maximum age, in days.  Indices older than this will be rolled over.

max_docs.label: Max Documents
max_docs.description: The maximum number of documents.  Indices with more than this number of documents will be rolled over.

max_size.label: Max Size
max_size.description: The maximum size, in gigabytes.  Indices larger than this will be rolled over.

actions.name: manage_force_merge
actions.description: Manage the force merge of the indices in the cluster.

include_patterns.label: Include Patterns
include_patterns.description: The index patterns, using regular expressions, to include in the force merge.

exclude_patterns.label: Exclude Patterns
exclude_patterns.description: The index patterns, using regular expressions, to exclude from the force merge.

max_age.label: Max Age
max_age.description: The maximum age, in days.  Indices older than this will be force merged.

max_segments.label: Max Segments
max_segments.description: The maximum number of segments.  Indices with more than this number of segments will be force merged.

max_deleted_docs.label: Max Deleted Documents
max_deleted_docs.description: The maximum number of deleted documents.  Indices with more than this number of deleted documents will be force merged.

read_only.label: Only Target Read Only Indices
read_only.description: Only target indices that are set to read only.

priority.label: Priority
priority.description: The priority of this configuration.  Lower numbers are higher priority.

target_input.label: Target Input
target_input.description: The input to target with this configuration.
